snippet: The publisher and activist Paige Powell shares intimate snapshots from her personal archives, which remained untouched for almost 40 years.
abstract: Snapshots from publisher and activist Paige Powell's personal archives, which remained untouched for almost 40 years, are part of two installations at Portland Art Museum.
lead_paragraph: The publisher and activist Paige Powell shares intimate snapshots from her personal archives, which remained untouched for almost 40 years.

headline.main: Never-Before-Seen Photos of Madonna, Warhol, Basquiat and More
